summary: Brookhaven National Laboratory is a laboratory in the United States at Long Island, New York.
full_text: Brookhaven National Laboratory  is a United States national laboratory located in Upton, New York, on Long Island, and was formally established in 1947 at the site of Camp Upton, a former U.S. Army base. Its name stems from its location in the greater area of the Town of Brookhaven.
title: Brookhaven National Laboratory
